select1.label: Make foundation as in an open bed without draw mackintosh and draw sheet
Place extra blanket one under the patient .place draw mackintosh and draw sheet just under the buttocks of patient
Place the other blanket just over patient body .use cradle
Wash hands
Assemble equipment and arrange it on bedside chair or table .remove unnecessary equipment
Draw room curtain around bed or close door or provide screen
Adjust bed light to comfortable working condition .lowers side rail on your bed. Remove call light
Loosen up top linen sheet at foot of bed
Remove bed spread and blanket separately and place them in linen bag .don't allow linen to contact uniform, dont tan or shake linen

If blanket and spread are to be reused , fold by bringing top and bottom edges together .fold side furthest from your working side over onto nearer bottom edge together again ,place folded linen on bed or chair

Cover client with bath blanket in following manner. Unfold bath blanket over top sheet. Ask client to hold top edge of bath blanket .if client is unable to help, tuck top of bath blanket under shoulder and bring sheet down to foot of bed. remove sheet and discard it in linen bag
With assistance from another nurse slide mattress towards of bed
Position client on far side of bed , facing away . Adjust pillow under head. be sure side rail is up
Loosen bottom linen , moving from head to foot

With same side down fan fold bottom sheet towards client . first draw sheet , then bottom sheet .tuck edges of linen just under buttocks , back and shoulder .don't fold mattress pad if it's to be reused
Wipe of any moisture on exposed mattress with towel and approximate disinfectant

Apply clean linen to exposed half of bed - Place clean mattress pad on bed by folding it lengthwise with centres crease in middle of bed . fanfold top layers over mattress .if pad is reused , smooth out wrinkles - Unfold bottom sheet lengthwise so that centres crease is situated lengthwise along centers of bed alongside client. Smooth bottom layers of sheet over mattress .allow sheet edge to hang about 25cm over mattress edge. Lower linen of bottom sheet should lie seam down and even with bottom edge of mattress

Mites bottom sheet at head of bed - Face head of bed diagonally .place hand away from head of bed under top corner of mattress , near mattress edge and fit - With one hand , tuck top edge of bottom sheet smoothly under matress so that side edges of sheet above and below mattress would meet if brought together . - Face side of bed and pick up top edge of sheet at approx. 45cm from top of mattress - Lift sheet and lay it on top of mattress to form near triangle fold , with lower base of triangle even with mattress edge - Tuck lower edge of sheet which is hanging free below mattress , under mattress .tuck with palm down .do without pulling triangular fold - Hold position of sheet covering side of mattress in place with one hand .With other hand , pick up top of triangular linen fold and bring it down over side of mattress ,tuck this position under mattress
Tuck in remaining position of sheet under mattress , moving towards foot of bed . keep linen smooth

Optional : Open draw sheet so that it unfolds in half .long centers fold along middle of bed lengthwise and position sheet so that it will be under buttocks and torso . fanfold top layer towards client with edge along back . smooth bottom layer out over mattress and tuck excess edge under mattress
Place water proof pad over draw sheet with centres fold against clients side.fanfold for half towards client
Raise side rail on working side and go to other side
Lower side rail. Assist client to roll slowly on other side. Over folds of linen
Loosen edges of soiled linen from under mattress
Remove soiled linen by folding it into bundle or square , with soiled linen turned inside .discard in linen bag
Spread fan folded clean linen smoothly ones edge of mattress from head to foot of bed
Assist client on rolling back into supine position .reposition pillows
Mites top corners of bottom sheet .when tucking corners , be sure sheet is smooth and free of wrinkles
Facing side of bed , grasp remaining edge of bottom sheet .lean back , keep back straight and pull as you tuck excess linen under mattress ,proceed from head to foot of bed
Smooth fan folded draw sheet out over bottom sheet .grasp edge of sheet with palms down , lean back and tuck sheet under mattress .tuck from middle to top and then to bottom
Place top sheet on client with centrefold lengthwise down middle of bed. open sheet from head to toe and unfold over client
Ask client to hold clean top sheet or tuck sheet around clients shoulder . Remove bath blanket and discard in linen bag .

Place blanket on bed , unfolding it so that crease runs lengthwise along middle of bed .Unfold blanket to cover client .top edge should be parallel with edge of top sheet and 15-20 cms from top sheets edge
Place spread over bed according to step 30 . be sure that top edge of spread extends about 2.5 cm above blanket's edge. Tuck top edge of spread over and under top edge of blanket
Make cuff by turning edge of top sheet down ones top edge of blanket and spread

Standing on one side at foot of bed , lift mattress corner slightly with one hand and tuck top linens under mattress . top sheet and blanket are tucked under together. Be sure that linens are loose enough to allow movement of clients feet

Make modified mittered corners with top sheet, blanket and spread - Pick up side edge of top sheet, blanket and spread approx. 5cm from foot of mattress , under mattress .do not pull triangular fold and lay it on bed - Tuck lower edge of sheet , which is hanging free below mattress , under mattress .don't pull triangular fold - Pick up triangular fold and bring it down over mattress while folding linen in place alongside of mattress .don't tuck tip of triangle

Raise side rail , make other side of bed , spread sheet , blanket and bed spreads out evenly .fold top edge of spread over blanket and make cuff with top sheet , make modified mittered corner at foot of bed

Change pillow case - Have client raise head, while supporting neck, remove pillow. allow client to lower head - Remove soiled case by grasping pillow at open end with one hand and pulling case over pillow with one hand . discard case in linen bag - Be sure pillow corners fit evenly in corners of pillow case .place pillow down over pillow with other hand .
Place call light within clients reach and return bed to comfortable position
Open room contains. Rearrange furniture .place personal items within easy reach on overbed table or bedside table or bedside stand. Return bed to comfortable height
Discard dirty linen in hamper or chute , wash hands
Bedmaking need not be documented. record clients vital signs and symptoms if there are changes
Ask if client feels comfortable
